metadata.title: CVE-2019-7345 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: Self - Stored Cross Site Scripting (XSS) exists in ZoneMinder through 1.32.3, as the view 'options' (options.php) does no input validation for the WEB_TITLE, HOME_URL, HOME_CONTENT, or WEB_CONSOLE_BANNER value, allowing an attacker to execute HTML or JavaScript code. This relates to functions.php.

criterions.comment: zoneminder package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
